subject: RE: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: Mike, ... synch ... Interesting idea.  Would you happen to have a working example of something that could slide into Ant that does this? TIA, Richard
messageBody:
Mike,


>I typically use
> JavaDoc
> simply to look up a method signature, which can easily be kept in
synch
> with the code using an automated build process.
>

Interesting idea. Would you happen to have a working example of
something that could slide into Ant that does this?

TIA,
Richard
